channel.title: Amount of xp changing
channel.description:
Hey i was wondering how do you change the amount of xp you get when you hit an npc.
right now in my server if i hit a:
1 i get 16 xp to attk or str or def
10 i get 160 xp to attk or str or def
how do i change the amount?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2007, 09:36:30 AM[/size][hr]no one knows -.-
